title:
Air Quality Data at Queen Elizabeth Central Hospital (QECH),
    Blantyre, Malawi
text: packages contains data collected part research study Queen Elizabeth Central Hospital (QECH) Blantyre Malawi. Particulate matter measurements (PM 2.5 & PM 10) taken 5-minute intervals eight sensor locations two months.

title:
Air Quality Data at Queen Elizabeth Central Hospital (QECH),
    Blantyre, Malawi
text: data used manuscript subitted Habitat International journal. underlying code can found separate repository. manuscript.qmd reproducible.
